title: T206's needed, buy or trade for these T205s
author: biggies

posts.post_title: T206's needed, buy or trade for these T205s
posts.post_content:
Hello,

I've been away for some time out of necessity and am returning to try and finish off some old ambitions.
One is to complete a set my father started many years ago, lost to theft, and started up again by my Sister and I a few years ago.
I am down to the following list and would prefer to trade but will buy as well. I am posting some T205s I have for trade, don't have much other pre war. They are crease free and I would believe would grade pretty well. If you have anything from my list I would appreciate any help.
Thanks, Bob

98 Coles, 
99 Collins, Eddie Philadelphia
122b Demmit-St Louis,                           Yikes!!!!!
143a J. Doyle-NY Natl hands above head, Yikes!!!!!
155b Elbefeld-Washington portrait, 
157 Ellam,
172 Foster, 
175 Fritz,
193 Guiheen,
202 Helm, 
206 Hickman,
213 Hooker, 
229 Johnson-hands at chest, 
244 Kiernan,
264 Lajoie-w/bat, 
287a Magie,                                            Yikes!!!!!
291 Manion, 
355b O'Hara-St Louis                               Yikes!!!!!
362 Otey, 
367 Paige,
375 Perdue,
377 Persons,
385 Plank,                                         Double Yikes!!!!!
395 Reagan, 
398 Revelle,
409 Ryan,
429 Shaughnessy,
450 Stark,
470 Thebo,
473 Thornton,
484 Wagner-bat on left shoulder,
those are FAKE T205's.   Not a chance they are real.

Andrew,

I concur with no hesitation.
Here are what some real ones look like. Notice the color difference in the border.
Okay, forget trading the T205s, am interested in purchasing.
Great way to come back to the board offering fake t205's for trade.  Come on.

[quote name="iwantitiwinit" post=942197]Great way to come back to the board offering fake t205's for trade.  Come on.[/QUOTE]


People aren't allowed to make mistakes?  I didn't see the original scan, but I don't think he was doing anything intentional.  If you wanted to pass of fake cards, this would be the last place anyone would try.

Mac

One of the reasons I was "away" was personal financial stuff. Another was the often caustic and difficult level of communication that this forum can be. We are all not collecting crumudgeons and believe that it is better to collect than to abuse.
I apparently made an error. I do not collect T205's and haven't ever really studied them. The 4 that I have have been in a box for a very long time and were given to me by a friend, He may or may not have known if they were real or not. He's dead so I can't ask him. Once it was pointed out to me that they were not real I pulled them off immediately.
Anyway, I apologize if I offended anyone and you needn't worry about me doing that again.

Bob

Hi Bob,
E-mail sent re a duplicate Thebo in PSA 3.5, piedmont back, that I could sell for $150 (includes shipping and PayPal fees).

[IMG]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-V6QvZZ5YkcU/TkigQKtJ6lI/AAAAAAAANts/qk3LJc7gHKo/s640/T206%252520Thebo%252520%2525282%252529%252520-%252520front.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-dXvl-N1Oqv8/TkigQF2_aXI/AAAAAAAANt0/ffs0rFrtrWQ/s640/T206%252520Thebo%252520%2525282%252529%252520-%252520rear.jpg[/IMG]

Hope that helps,
--S
